title: Opinion: Mathieu van der Poel Is the Only Problem Left for Tadej Pogačar
content:
Forget the rest of the 'Big 4.' Forget the cruelty of the cobbles. If Pogačar wants to add San Remo, Roubaix, and the Vuelta to his palmarès, he needs to unpick MVDP.
